pwInfo.saveYourPasswords: Store all your passwords, data or any information here. Forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
pwInfo.createMasterKey: Create your master password: only you will be able to access your secrets with it.
pwInfo.createDifferentPassword: First of all you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
pwInfo.infoCanSave: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your cell phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to keep in a safe place.

pwCreation.shouldCreatePassword: First of all you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
pwCreation.alsoCanCreateHint: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
pwCreation.createHint: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)

errors.patternMismatch: The password must contain 8 to 24 characters, at least 1 number and 1 capital letter.
errors.mismatch: This password must be the same as the first one.

pwFeedback.weCannotUpdate: We were unable to change your Master Password. Please try again later.
pwFeedback.passwordManagerCreated: Your password manager is already created!
pwFeedback.loremIpsum: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas varius tortor nibh.
